## Data wrangling



```{r}
data_trim <- data %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  select(-date, #352 unique values
         -id, #not needed in this case
         -sqft_living15, 
         -sqft_lot15, 
         -zipcode #we do have lat and long
         )
```
